title: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure.
description: When using a stored procedure, the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename'.
OB: Currently, when using a stored procedure, the schema is not being added to the procedure name.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a stored procedure is used, it should be in the format 'schemaname.Procedurename' to ensure proper schema resolution.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report. 2. Use a stored procedure within the report without specifying the schema, and observe that the schema is not automatically added to the procedure name.
